EmailTemplate.name: Expedition Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Requested Expedited DGR Request - Employer Name: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Document Generation Request : {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Name} for {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c}, {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c} has been submitted as an Expedited Request approval.
Thank you.
